short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate Markdown embed code and HTML embed code from the image link.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ Features
1. ⚡️ Quickly generate Markdown and HTML embed code from the image link.
2. ⭐️ Copy the generated code with one click.
3. 🔧 Customize the output embed code.
4. 🌛 Beautiful user interface and supports dark mode.
5. 📦 Automatically convert Dropbox share link into download link.
6. 🤖️ Automatically extract URL from your clipboard.

❗️ Notice
This extension required the "storage" and "clipboard" privilege. It won't collect, read or transmit any data of any kind.
